idea:
We launch ourselves as CUROMATES ENTERPRISE PRIVATE LIMITED pioneers in providing therapies and consultation for various diseases to its distinguished clients. Curomates introduces a multi-layer model to help people get aware about their problem and seek helps. The various layers include communities, peer counselling, active listening, group therapies, tracking tools, conventional therapies and much more. This clinically validated therapy-companion software would help patients better manage their health condition in collaboration with their provider.

 

With a team of highly experienced specialists that source, assess and deliver as required, services get who they need on time and on budget. This enables us to deliver a high level of service to our clients, provide, encourage, initiate or promote facilities for the discovery, improvement or development of new methods of diagnostic, understanding and prevention and treatment of disease.

 

We provide online doctor consultancy, diagnostic reference, air ambulance, surgical and medical device referring services to the customers, schedule appointments, teleconsulting, telemedicine, tele counselling, data analysis, data processing, health tracking tools, health monitoring, make online transactions and payments, provide online courses and content, connect health professionals
name: CUROMATES ENTERPRISE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Ubuntu Montessori is a private pre-school following true Montessori curriculum for children between the ages of 18 months and 6 years. Montessori is an entirely different approach to early childhood education which helps children become compassionate human beings, respecting all people and viewpoints.


We at Ubuntu Montessori believe that each and every child is unique and follows his or her natural path of development. Following a curriculum which is true to the original Montessori Method, we endeavour to enrich the social, cognitive, emotional and physical aspects of the childâ€™s growth.
